title: No. 9 Tech wins marathon at ACU - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: No. 9 Tech wins marathon at ACU - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: ABILENE, Texas – No. 9 Texas Tech survived a 4-hour, 42-minute marathon on Tuesday night, topping Abilene Christian 16-12 at Crutcher Scott Field. The squads combined for 31 hits, producing a collective 28 runs, with a total of 81 at-bats between both squads. Seven pitchers saw action for Tech while 10 pitchers saw time for ACU.
